snippet: A reader says the version in private hands is in captivity.
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: '' 'The Scream' on the Block'' (editorial, May 5), about the private sale of one of the four versions of Edvard Munch's ''Scream,'' describes the privately owned work as ''in the wild,'' and the three others as ''captive in Norwegian museums.'' That gets it exactly backward.
